name: DHAR - Multiplayer
description: Play with your friend or random person in this online co-op horror game. It requires two players. Note: This game requires both players to have a working PC and internet connection. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Co-op (Online): Two people are trapped in a creepy house and they need to escape. The problem is they have different disabilities, one can't walk and one can't see very well. They aren't alone, the place is swarming with scary walking skeletons, they can't see both of you but if you get really close to them... they will hurt you. You can't fight them so you need to avoid them. The watcher has a laser to point at places so the runner can be guided or the watcher can send a stop message to the runner as a warning. The laser won't last forever, but you may find some batteries around. The key is communication and helping each other to get out before the worse happens. Controls: Use Laser: [Left Mouse Button] (Watcher Only) Send Stop Massage: [Right Mouse Button] (Watcher Only) Navigate: [W]-[A]-[S]-[D] (Runner Only) Sprint: [L Shift] (Runner Only) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Self Hosting: If the main server is full at the moment: You can set up your own (free) private server (Self Hosting): 1. Go to https://www.photonengine.com/ 2. Sign in or create an account 3. Go to https://dashboard.photonengine.com/en-US/ 4. Click CREATE A NEW APP 5. For Photon Type, choose Photon PUN. Name the application anything you want it doesn't matter. 6. Click CREATE 7. In the list of your applications, copy the App ID of the one you just made. Should look something like 401c4386-8db1-4e1d-b7bd-e7f2b51c4782 8. Run the game and select Self Hosting option and paste the App ID (Ctrl + V). 9. Click Self Host. If you want other players to be able to join you: - Make sure you both paste the same App ID in the Self Hosting option field. - Make sure you both connected to the same region (you can select region before joining a lobby). - Make sure you both have the same game version: this one is (v2.0) --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- If you want you can play offline as Single Player: - You're Trapped In A Creepy House And You Need To Escape Through The Main Door. - Be Careful.. You Aren't Alone, The Place Is Swarming With Invisible Walking Skeletons. - You Can't See Them, And They Can't See You Too. - If You Get Really Close To Them... They Will Hurt You. - You Can't Fight Them, You Need To Avoid Them. - However You Can Use Your Charged Laser To Find And Detect Those Skeletons For A Short Time. - The Laser Won't Last Forever.. But You May Find Some Batteries Around. Controls: Use Laser: [Left Mouse Button] Navigate: [W]-[A]-[S]-[D] Sprint: [L Shift] ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
